i get no audio... whys that?

Audio Tracks are all demuxed (SEPARATE), so download the ones you want.
Use MPC (  http://cccp-project.net/ ) to automatically recognize & play the external Audio tracks or mux the Audio in MKV with  mkvmerge
(  http://www.videohelp.com/tools/MKVtoolnix ) if you wish to use other player.

..often the answer is in the front of you if you're not lazy to look & read. 
Read description for God's sake.

Any suggestions for playing these on a mac?

CCCP is windows only, and MKVToolnix can only be installed if you install macports, which can only be installed if you're an apple developer or have xcode :(

The vid files look great, though! Can't wait to watch em all again.
Why make this harder then it needs to be? I don't want to download shit
I don't get it. How to I get audio? Does it work for Mac?

Play it using VLC on Mac.

VLC usually plays anything.

Thanks, quality is great. Super fast download. 

A/V: 10/10
I agree with the previous poster.  There are several standard players and formats out there.  Thx for wasting my time by not using any of them.
